content.description: Tucked into the corner, this climb is the easiest way up the crag. Work the crack systems through the dihedral and chimney up to the same finish as No Pro Bro.
content.protection: Standard Rack, top out and walk off or or sling the tree at the top to top rope or lower.
content.location: Tucked into the dihedral on the east facing wall.

climbs.name: Ode To The No Pro Bro

content.description: A variation start to No Pro Bro, start on the two cracks left of the two used on No Pro and climb over just slightly easier rock. About half way up switch over right to finish on No Pro. Ode is a fun variation that basically has a few more holds outside the crack than No Pro.
content.location: Start just left of the normal start to No Pro Bro

content.description: The prominent and beautiful steeply overhanging hand crack(s). Start on the rightmost hand crack and let the games begin. Work primarily up this crack but don't be afraid to reach out to the crack immediately out left. About halfway up the steep section you get some good holds outside the crack but good jamming skills are still critical. Finish out right and climb some easy rock to the very top. Overall a beautiful and crazy fun short but stout overhanging hand crack.
content.location: The main line on the east facing wall
